answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!Otitis media, ear wax, autoimmune inner ear disease, and enlarged vesibular aqueduct syndrome all cause tinnitus with fluctuating hearing loss.Diabetes mellitus is another condition that can precipitate all your symptoms.It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
